Title: Heart Attack
Writer: Michael Connelly (based on the novels by), Eric Ellis Overmyer (developed for television by), Diane Frolov, Andrew Schneider, Joe Gonzalez (story editor), Tom Bernardo (staff writer)
Actors: Titus Welliver, Jamie Hector, Amy Aquino, Sarah Clarke
Plot: Heightened circumstances create an unlikely family reunion for Bosch. A surprising revelation forces Harry back to square one on his case. The FBI approaches Eleanor with an enticing deal. George Irving faces severe jeopardy.
